data.name: invalid_rgb_color.description
data.value: The **RGB** color you provided is invalid. Please make sure that all values are between `0` and `255`.

data.name: invalid_hex_color.description
data.value: The **Hex** color you provided is invalid.

data.name: on_cooldown.description
data.value: There are `{0:D}` minutes and `{1:D}` seconds remaining.

data.name: not_the_owner.description
data.value: Sorry, but you are not the owner of this bot.

data.name: ping.description
data.value: `{0:D}ms` is my estimated round-trip latency to the gateway server.
